channel.title: Playwright on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in Playwright on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 83: Playwright - with Debbie O'Brien
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Debbie O’Brien to chat about Playwright - Microsoft’s open-source end-to-end testing framework. I’m a huge fan of Playwright, so I was really excited to have this chat with Debbie. We covered a lot of ground, including features such as Codegen, Trace Viewer, and UI Mode. We also spoke a lot about AI - including the exciting Playwright MCP Server which enables AI agents to automate browser interactions!
